welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Finchampstead, a charming town nestled in the beautiful countryside of United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and luxurious experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of private and business jet passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and offers a range of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and is not accessible to the general public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 45 minutes per device. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and executive flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
